    • Method Detail

      • getApi

        public static GimbalApi getApi(Drone drone)

      • getGimbalOrientation

        public GimbalApi.GimbalOrientation getGimbalOrientation()

      • startGimbalControl

        public void startGimbalControl(GimbalApi.GimbalOrientationListener listener)
        Enables control of the gimbal. After calling this method, use updateGimbalOrientation(float, float, float, GimbalOrientationListener) to update the gimbal orientation.
        Parameters:
        listener - non-null GimbalStatusListener callback.

      • stopGimbalControl

        public void stopGimbalControl(GimbalApi.GimbalOrientationListener listener)
        Disables control of the gimbal. After calling this method, no call to updateGimbalOrientation(float, float, float, GimbalOrientationListener) will be allowed.
        Parameters:
        listener - non-null GimbalStatusListener callback.
        Since:
        2.5.0

      • updateGimbalOrientation

        public void updateGimbalOrientation(GimbalApi.GimbalOrientation orientation,
                                    @NonNull
                                    GimbalApi.GimbalOrientationListener listener)
        Set the orientation of the gimbal
        Parameters:
        orientation - Desired orientation values.
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution state. Must be non-null.
        Since:
        2.8.0

      • updateGimbalOrientation

        public void updateGimbalOrientation(float pitch,
                                    float roll,
                                    float yaw,
                                    @NonNull
                                    GimbalApi.GimbalOrientationListener listener)
        Set the orientation of a gimbal
        Parameters:
        pitch - the desired gimbal pitch in degrees. 0 is straight forwards, -90 is straight down
        roll - the desired gimbal roll in degrees
        yaw - the desired gimbal yaw in degrees
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution state. Must be non-null.
        Since:
        2.5.0
